subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With its “grit and grind” style, Memphis managed to hold off a persistent Oklahoma City team to take a 2-1 lead in their second-round N.B.A. playoff series.
snippet: With its “grit and grind” style, Memphis managed to hold off a persistent Oklahoma City team to take a 2-1 lead in their second-round N.B.A. playoff series.
